snippet.title: Tethered - Gameplay Footage
snippet.description:
Here's Tethered in action!
Without a VR headset you’re missing out on the beautifully crafted immersion that the hand-painted art style and lush and expansive audio presentation offer, but we can still show you some awesome gameplay footage, captured in real time as the game is played.

Read more in our Developers Blog:
http://www.secretsorcery.com/blog/
